description: Erection of a side roof extension to form a hip to gable roof, including demolition of an existing chimney stack, installation of 2no. rooflights in the front roofslope, and 1no. rooflight in the side roofslope; erection of a rear dormer roof extension, following the removal of existing dormer window in the rear roofslope; erection of a single storey rear extension, following the demolition of existing ground floor back addition; installation of new double glazed timber framed windows to replace existing, to the front elevation at first and ground floor level; excavation of the front garden to form a lightwell with metal grille on top, and excavation beneath the footprint of the main building in connection with the lowering and enlargement of the existing basement; excavation of the side garden to form a lightwell with 1.1m high glass balustrade around the perimeter and formation of external stairs to the rear elevation leading into the rear garden.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
